mgmt_ip.title: Management IP address
mgmt_ip.description: The BOF/Management IP address of the controller

mgmt_gateway.title: Management Network Gateway
mgmt_gateway.description: Gateway IP on the Management network

ctrl_ip.title: Control IP address
ctrl_ip.description: The Control/Data IP address of the controller

system_ip.title: System IP address
system_ip.description: Required for BGP pairing with peers

vmname.title: VM name
vmname.description: Name of the virtual machine on the Hypervisor/vCenter Server.

xmpp_username.title: XMPP username
xmpp_username.description: Username used to identify the XMPP connection with VSD

mgmt_static_route_list.title: Management Network Static Routes
mgmt_static_route_list.description: Static Route list to be configured on the management/BOF interface

target_server_type.title: Target Server type
target_server_type.description: Type of hypervisor environment into which the instance will be created

target_server.title: Target Server IP or FQDN
target_server.description: Hostname or IP address of the hypervisor where VM  will be instantiated. In the case of deployment in a vCenter environment, this will be the FQDN of the vCenter Server

mgmt_bridge.title: Management Network Bridge
mgmt_bridge.description: Network Bridge used for the management interface of a component or the BOF interface on VSC. This will be a Distributed Virtual PortGroup (DVPG) when deploying on vCenter or a Linux network bridge when deploying on KVM. This field can be overridden by defining the management network bridge separately in the component configuration. Defaults to the global setting

vsd_fqdn.title: VSD FQDN
vsd_fqdn.description: FQDN of the VSD or VSD cluster for this VSC

vcenter_datacenter.title: vCenter Datacenter Name
vcenter_datacenter.description: Name of the vCenter Datacenter on which the VSC VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Datacenter Name if not defined here.

vcenter_cluster.title: vCenter Cluster Name
vcenter_cluster.description: Name of the vCenter Cluster on which the VSC VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Cluster Name if not defined here.

vcenter_datastore.title: vCenter Datastore Name
vcenter_datastore.description: Name of the vCenter Datastore on which the VSC VM will be deployed. Defaults to the common vCenter Datastore Name if not defined here.

expected_num_bgp_peers.title: Expected number of BGP neighbors
expected_num_bgp_peers.description: Used in postdeploy and health workflows as expected values if non-zero

expected_num_vswitches.title: Expected number of vswitches
expected_num_vswitches.description: Used in postdeploy and health workflows as expected values if non-zero

expected_num_host_vports.title: Expected number of host vports
expected_num_host_vports.description: Used in postdeploy and health workflows as expected values if non-zero

expected_num_vm_vports.title: Expected number of VM vports
expected_num_vm_vports.description: Used in postdeploy and health workflows as expected values if non-zero

expected_num_gateway_ports.title: Expected number of gateway ports
expected_num_gateway_ports.description: Used in postdeploy and health workflows as expected values if non-zero

internal_mgmt_ip.title: Private Management IP
internal_mgmt_ip.description: Private Management IP Address of VSC Instances on AWS

mgmt_routed_network_name.title: Management Routed Network Name
mgmt_routed_network_name.description: Name of routed network for VSC Management Interface on AWS

data_routed_network_name.title: Data Routed Network Nmae
data_routed_network_name.description: Name of routed network for AWS VSC Data Interface on AWS

internal_ctrl_ip.title: Private Control IP Address
internal_ctrl_ip.description: Control IP Address of VSC Instances on AWS
